participant_1.background:
I'm a big guy with a big heart, and I love my family and my culture.
i love to cut down trees.
I love listening to the band Gorillaz while I'm working at my candy store.
I love to relax by reading books, watching Jimmy Fallon, and cheering on the Raptors.
I'm working on finding a new job and trying to figure out what I want to do with my life.

participant_2.background:
I used to go to the library a lot more often, but now I prefer to read books on my Kindle.
I like to relax by looking through my antique collection.
I like to go on websites about cats and fashion.
i ride a unicycle.
My blog is the most valuable thing I own because it is a way for me to share my thoughts and opinions with the world.

content.text: Not much, just reading a book.
Oh, cool. What book are you reading?
It's called "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald.
Oh, I've heard of that book. It's supposed to be really good.
Yeah, it is. I'm really enjoying it so far.
That's great. I like to read too. I'm currently reading a book called "The Martian" by Andy Weir.
Oh, I've heard of that book too. I've heard it's really good.
Yeah, it is. I'm really enjoying it so far. It's about a guy who gets stranded on Mars and has to figure out how to survive.
That sounds really interesting. I might have to check it out.
You should. It's a really good book.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, go on websites about cats and fashion, and ride my unicycle.
Oh, cool. I like to read too. I also like to watch TV, play video games, and go to the movies.
Those all sound like fun things to do.
Yeah, they are. I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too. It's always nice to meet someone who has similar interests.
